release_notes.en-US:
Version 2.2.

Grid in HTML was corrected.

March 21st 2021.

From Sungho Hwang.

description.en-US: Timetable is displayed in browserAction popup. Semi Web application using html window for indexedDB. 1) New Indexed Database for Timetable is created. 2) New object store of the database is created. 3) New record in the object store is created. 4) Data in the record is updated if you fill each input field and click "Update" button. 5) Data remain displayed automatically in each input field. # One record is updated, not adding next record. So, storage volume is saved. # I seem that timetable is not needed to add cumulative records which are different to calendar items. Storage permission is needed for yourself. Display just previous schedule. Update current time schedule. Good to update future schedule too. I thank God through Jesus Christ. January 23th 2021. From Sungho Hwang.
description.ko: Timetable is displayed in browserAction popup. Semi Web application using html window for indexedDB. 1) New Indexed Database for Timetable is created. 2) New object store of the database is created. 3) New record in the object store is created. 4) Data in the record is updated if you fill each input field and click "Update" button. 5) Data remain displayed automatically in each input field. # One record is updated, not adding next record. So, storage volume is saved. # I seem that timetable is not needed to add cumulative records which are different to calendar items. Storage permission is needed for yourself. Display just previous schedule. Update current time schedule. Good to update future schedule too. I thank God through Jesus Christ. January 23th 2021. From Sungho Hwang.

summary.en-US:
Timetable is displayed in browserAction popup.

[Corrected HTML frame in March 21st 2021]

Display just previous schedule.
Update current time schedule.
Good to update future schedule too.

I thank God through Jesus Christ.
summary.ko:
웹시간표는 브라우저액션 팝업에서 열립니다.

직전 시간표가 나타납니다.
현재 시간표를 갱신하세요.
다음날 시간표를 작성하셔도 좋습니다. 

하느님께 감사드립니다.

개발자 황성호.
